name: Rental Rundown
description:
You are the manager of the world’s last Blockbuster. Your company is sinking, both metaphorically and literally into the ground. You need to help all the customers, or a single bad review will cripple the stock! Likewise, to prevent the building from sinking, you need to go underground, murder dinosaurs, and use their bones as scaffolding for structural support. (as if that needed to be explained)Controls

W A S D : Move

W : Interact

Left Mouse Button : Shoot Lasers, click buttons, scan barcodes

ESC: Pause
